plot: A little lamb's life is turned upside down by the wolf that killed his mother. He seeks to avenge his mother, but in order to defeat the wolf, he must become one.
opening_theme: "Chirin's Bell" (チリンの鈴) by The Brothers Four
ending_theme: "Chirin's Bell" (チリンの鈴) by The Brothers Four
insert_song: "I Am Chirin" by The Brothers Four
